org.netbeans.api.search.ui

Class ScopeOptionsController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.netbeans.api.search.ui.ScopeOptionsController

  • public final class ScopeOptionsController
extends Object
    Component controller for setting search scope options. Use ComponentUtils to create instances of this class.

      • ignoreListOptionPanel

        protected JPanel ignoreListOptionPanel

    • Method Detail

      • getSearchScopeOptions

        public SearchScopeOptions getSearchScopeOptions()
        Return search scope options reflecting the actual state of the panel. Modifying returned object will not affect this panel.

      • isSearchInArchives

        public boolean isSearchInArchives()
        State of checkbox for enabling searching in archives.
        Returns:
        True if searching in archives is enabled, false if it is disabled.

      • isSearchInGenerated

        public boolean isSearchInGenerated()
        State of checkbox for enabling searching in generated sources. Generated sources include class files or web service stubs generated for WSDL files. These files are usualy filtered out by SharabilityQuery.
        Returns:
        True if searching in generated sources is enabled, false otherwise.
        See Also:
        SharabilityQuery

      • isUseIgnoreList

        public boolean isUseIgnoreList()
        State of checkbox for using ignore list. If this method returns true, SearchScopeOptions object returned from getSearchScopeOptions() includes filter for ignored files.
        Returns:
        True if ignore list is enabled, false otherwise.

      • isFileNameRegExp

        public boolean isFileNameRegExp()
        Returns:
        True if file name pattern is set to be used as regular expression for matching the whole file path, false is it should be used as simple pattern for file names.

      • setSearchInArchives

        public void setSearchInArchives(boolean searchInArchives)
        Enable/disable searching in archives.

      • setSearchInGenerated

        public void setSearchInGenerated(boolean searchInGenerated)
        Enable/disable searching in generated sources.

      • setUseIgnoreList

        public void setUseIgnoreList(boolean useIgnoreList)
        Enable/disable using ignore list.

      • setFileNameRegexp

        public void setFileNameRegexp(boolean fileNameRegexp)
        Enable/disable regular expression mode.
        See Also:
        isFileNameRegExp()

      • getFileNameComponent

        @NullUnknown
public JPanel getFileNameComponent()
        Get the panel containing controls related to file name pattern settings. This is only applicable if the controller was created using ComponentUtils.adjustPanelsForOptions(JPanel, JPanel, boolean, FileNameController).
        Returns:
        Panel containing controls related to file name pattern settings, or null if there is a single panel for all settings.
        Since:
        api.search/1.12

      • getComponent

        public final T getComponent()

      • addChangeListener

        public final void addChangeListener(@NonNull
                                    ChangeListener listener)
        Adds a ChangeListener to the listener list. The same listener object may be added more than once, and will be called as many times as it is added. If listener is null, no exception is thrown and no action is taken.
        Parameters:
        listener - the ChangeListener to be added.

      • removeChangeListener

        public final void removeChangeListener(@NonNull
                                       ChangeListener listener)
        Removes a ChangeListener from the listener list. If listener was added more than once, it will be notified one less time after being removed. If listener is null, or was never added, no exception is thrown and no action is taken.
        Parameters:
        listener - the ChangeListener to be removed.

      • fireChange

        protected final void fireChange()
        Fires a change event to all registered listeners.

      • hasListeners

        public final boolean hasListeners()
        Checks if there are any listeners registered to this ChangeSupport.
        Returns:
        true if there are one or more listeners for the given property, false otherwise.
